title: Wand of iceblast
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Wand                                                                                     |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | Wand of iceblast                                                                         |
| Icon | [![Wand of iceblast.png](/images/7/7f/Wand_of_iceblast.png)](/File:Wand_of_iceblast.png) |

|   |                                                                                                            |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A magical device which throws exploding shards of ice, partially harming even creatures resistant of cold. |

A **wand of iceblast** creates an unavoidable, 3x3 explosion, much like a [cold](/Cold "Cold") version of [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"). This wand is 50% irresistible; it deals 50% cold and 50% physical damage. For example, a monster immune to cold will take half damage from this wand.

Players deal `3d(7.66 + 3.5 * Evocations/5)` damage with this wand.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

Monsters deal `3d(6 + (30 + HD)/12)` damage with this wand.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

This wand is [mutually exclusive](/Alternate_items "Alternate items") with the [wand of roots](/Wand_of_roots "Wand of roots"). [Artificers](/Artificer "Artificer") will always begin with 5 charges of iceblast, regardless of which wand is actually generated in the Dungeon.

## Tips & Tricks

- Wands of iceblast fill a unique slot in any [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") specialist's arsenal, as enemies can't [evade](/Ev "Ev") the attack or ignore it entirely with [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"). They can be used to finish off a deadly monster, or to kill high EV enemies like [boggarts](/Boggart "Boggart") and [spriggans](/List_of_spriggans "List of spriggans"). Just be aware that they lack power without much Evocations training.
- Firing a wand of iceblast point-blank at your foe guarantees you'll be caught in the blast. Use it *before* engaging in melee, or angle your shot diagonally behind your foe if possible.
- Monsters aren't willing to blast themselves. Against an [Ijyb](/Ijyb "Ijyb") with iceblast, being adjacent will prevent the wand from being used. (Monsters aren't smart enough to aim diagonally behind.)

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), iceblast's damage was 60% irresistible.
- Prior to [0.24](/0.24 "0.24"), monsters couldn't use this wand.
- Prior to [0.21](/0.21 "0.21"), wands of iceblast could hold at most 15 charges.
- Wands of iceblast were added in [0.18](/0.18 "0.18").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [zap-data.h:1456](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1456) (0.31.0)  
   Specifically, you'll deal `3d(14/3 + pow/5)` damage, for pow = `15 + 3.5 * Evocations` ([evoke.cc:189](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/evoke.cc#L189) (0.31.0)). If you have the [MP-Powered Wands](/MP-Powered_Wands "MP-Powered Wands") mutation, then your "pow" gains a +33% boost.
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [zap-data.h:1458](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.31.0/crawl-ref/source/zap-data.h#L1458) (0.31.0)
